consoleAdapters.name: Expansion Pak
consoleAdapters.details: The Expansion Pak consists of 4 MB of RAM increasing the console's RAM from 4 MB to 8 MB of contiguous main memory. It is installed in a port on top of the console and replaces the pre-installed Jumper Pak. There were 64 games that could use the Expansion Pak for enhanced graphics, higher resolutions, and more.
